thread.title: VIDEO: Cleveland Indians manager Terry Francona records a message for NESN broadcaster Don Orsillo
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Cleveland Indians manager Terry Francona records a message for NESN broadcaster Don Orsillo

author: Jen McCaffrey | jmccaffr@masslive.com
title: VIDEO: Cleveland Indians manager Terry Francona records a message for NESN broadcaster Don Orsillo
text:
Comments 
During his eight-year tenure as Red Sox manager, Terry Francona formed a special friendship with NESN broadcaster Don Orsillo. 
Friendship might an interesting word choice given most of their conversations revolved around making fun of one another and self-deprecating humor. But it was all in good fun. 
It seemed fitting then, that the Red Sox ended their season in Cleveland, where Francona currently serves as manager, so 
Francona recorded a parting message for Orsillo: 
Follow MassLive.com Red Sox beat reporter @jcmccaffrey on Twitter. She can be reached by email at jmccaffr@masslive.com .
